description: Numbers n such that n | Sigma(n) + d(n) + Phi(n).
maple: with(numtheory); List056012:=proc(q)  local n;for n from 1 to q do if type((sigma(n)+tau(n)+phi(n))/n,integer) then print(n); fi; od;end:  List056012(10^10); # _Paolo P. Lava_, Apr 29 2013
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jul 24 2000
extensions: a(7) corrected and a(10) added by _Donovan Johnson_, Nov 12 2012
